column4: hello everybody.. i used the computer janitor and after used it, some programms have been deleted by some reason.. i cannot install them anymore.. when i use, for example, "sudo apt-get install amsn" it shows me this message: "Package amsn is not available, but is referred to by another package. This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or is only available from another source. E: Package amsn has no installation candidate "
you can open it following system / administration / computer janitor
firewall blocking portmapper? no portmapper running?
